How to diagnose Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome type 1 ?,Is genetic testing available for Axenfeld Rieger syndrome? The Genetic Testing Registry (GTR) is a central online resource for information about genetic tests. The intended audience for the GTR is health care providers and researchers.
